Game: Burger Island 2009-05-01T00:00:00-07:00 As Patty Melton, the new owner of the tropical island-based Beach Burger restaurant, you must grill burgers, cook fries, and blend milkshakes all to order. Earn money to spread your franchise all the way to the capital city of Honochuchu.
